name: techmedics-userscript-tests
description: Browser environment test runner for TechMedics Red Team userscript

scripts.test:headless: node -e "const runner = require('./test-setup.js'); const r = new runner(); r.initialize().then(() => r.loadUserscript()).then(() => r.runTests()).then(console.log).catch(console.error);"

author: TechMedics Red Team Development Group
